mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_INQUIRY (ID, MEMBER_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_TYPE, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_INQUIRY.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryType}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_TYPE, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_INQUIRY ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
